org.opendaylight.controller.md.sal.common.api.routing

Interface RouteChangeListener<C,P>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - Type, which is used to represent Routing context.
    P - Type of data tree path, which is used to identify route.
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoutedRpcListener, RpcRouterCodegenInstance

    public interface RouteChangeListener<C,P>
extends java.util.EventListener
    Listener which is interested in receiving RouteChangeEvents for its local broker.

    Listener is registerd via RouteChangePublisher.registerRouteChangeListener(RouteChangeListener)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onRouteChange(RouteChange<C,P> change)
      Callback which is invoked if there is an rpc routing table change.

    • Method Detail

      • onRouteChange

        void onRouteChange(RouteChange<C,P> change)
        Callback which is invoked if there is an rpc routing table change.
        Parameters:
        change - Event representing change in local RPC routing table.
